DataElement.preferredName: Prior Photodynamic Therapy Past 3 Months Proposed Treatment Site Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether or not an individual has received prior photodynamic therapy (PDT) to the proposed treatment site within the prior 3 months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Photodynamic Therapy Past 3 Months Proposed Treatment Site
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Use of light activated drugs (photosensitizing agents) to kill cancer cells._Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::3_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A suggestion, intention or plan, especially one put forward formally or officially._Named locations of, or within, the body._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Use of light activated drugs (photosensitizing agents) to kill cancer cells.

Concepts.definition: Use of light activated drugs (photosensitizing agents) to treat cancer and other conditions.

Property.preferredName: Past Integer::3 Month Proposal Anatomic Site Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::3:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A suggestion, intention or plan, especially one put forward formally or officially.:Named locations of, or within, the body.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
A suggestion, intention or plan, especially one put forward formally or officially.
Named locations of or within the body.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient has received prior PD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has received prior PDT to the proposed treatment site within the prior 3 months
